entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Rain beginning early this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Clearing late in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 in the morning. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023
